overview: You've been a faithful fan of XL Girls for years. You know and love all the models and their hardcore scenes. You may even own a few XL Xtra titles. Well now we've compiled and remastered 22 of the best scenes from the XL Xtra series just for you. That means that you get more than seven hours of your favorite girls getting fucked in one easy-to-navigate collection. No more sifting through DVDs to find Samantha's hot interracial scene, or the only XXX scene that Lenka ever shot for us. It's all here-all the huge tits, curvy girls and creamy fuckholes that you crave. It's the Best of XL Xtra!
title: The Best of XL Xtra
